verses.verse: Hezekiah<WH2396> became<WH4427> king<WH4427> [when he was] twenty-five years<WH8141> old;<WH1121> and he reigned<WH4427> twenty-nine years<WH8141> in Jerusalem.<WH3389> And his mother's name<WH8034> [was] Abijah,<WH29> the daughter<WH1323> of Zechariah.<WH2148>

"Therefore the wrath<WH7110> of the Lord<WH3068> was against<WH5921> Judah<WH3063> and Jerusalem,<WH3389> and He has made<WH5414> them an object<WH2113> of terror,<WH2113> of horror,<WH8047> and of hissing,<WH8322> as you see<WH7200> with your own eyes.<WH5869>
"For behold,<WH2009> our fathers have fallen<WH1> by the sword,<WH5307> and our sons<WH2719> and our daughters<WH1121> and our wives<WH1323> are in captivity<WH802> for this.<WH7628>

Then Hezekiah<WH2396> gave<WH559> the order<WH559> to offer<WH5927> the burnt<WH5930> offering<WH5930> on the altar.<WH4196> When<WH6256> the burnt<WH5930> offering<WH5930> began,<WH2490> the song<WH7892> to the Lord<WH3068> also began<WH2490> with the trumpets,<WH2689> [accompanied] by the instruments<WH3627> of David,<WH1732> king<WH4428> of Israel.<WH3478>
